casebody.data:
Alex PEREZ and Cathy Perez, Plaintiffs-Petitioners,
v.
Susan ADLER, Esq., and Susan Adler-Attorney at Law, Defendants,
and
Tesser & Cohen, Gary Strong, Esq., and Stephen Winkles, Esq., Defendants-Respondents,
and
Porcello Engineering, Inc., Fred Porcello, and Gary Moore-Attorney at Law, Defendants-Respondents. C-785 September Term 2017
080354 Supreme Court of New Jersey. April 26, 2018

ON PETITION FOR CERTIFICATION.

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-004103-14 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
